Class PayPalItem

    • com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PayPalItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public final class PayPalItem
extends Object
implements Parcelable
    Provides option itemization detail for a PayPalPayment.

      • PayPalItem

        public PayPalItem(String name,
          Integer quantity,
          BigDecimal price,
          String currency,
          String sku)
        Create an item.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the item.
        quantity - Quantity of item.
        price - Per unit item price.
        currency - Currency code for the item.
        sku - SKU, or part number, for the item.

      • getItemTotal

        public static BigDecimal getItemTotal(PayPalItem[] items)
        Calculates and returns the total price of an array of PayPalItem objects. Each price is multiplied by the associated quantity and added to the total.
        Parameters:
        items -
        Returns:
        total price
